CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper August 16, 1947, pg. 23, reads: "'Good Conduct Reward' - A very pleasant reward for their cooperation as members of the Youth Progress Good Conduct Club was bestowed on these youthful members of a new section in the vast network of Good Conduct Clubs when they were taken on an outing recently at Fair View Park. Mrs. Helda Gilard and Mrs. Ardenia Sheffey, sponsors, look on as this crowd of happy children plan the fun they are going to have. At present the Youth Progress Good Conduct Clubs are still conducting drives to attract new members into the organization which is pledged to building character for young Americans. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Helda Gilard and Ardenia Sheffey posed with children, members of Youth Progress Good Conduct Club, gathered on steps of brick building
